> I suspect the 'referer' value may be an issu=
e.
> 
> The 's' parameter looks like a session value that is likely to have=
 
> expired by the time the crawler tries its login.
> 
> Also, the '&'=
 encoding is likely an artifact of the place where 
you 
> copied the value=
. Including it in the login-form-submission may 
confuse 
> the server.
> 
=

ems entirely, and seemed to login OK. (I was redirected back 
to

ums entry page, and the HTML showed me 'logged in as' my

ame.
